thread.section_title: LegalVision Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LegalVision | legalvision.com.au
thread.title: Ryan Macpherson

author: Ryan Macpherson
title: Ryan Macpherson
text:
Recently while going through a process of ensuring our new start up company was set up with Investment in mind, we utilised the Legal Vision Team's services! So impressed with the time and effort taken in understanding the product, company background and our need for time efficient advice!
These guys know their stuff and know the start up ecosystem well. Will be back for sure!
